response.answer_text: Hexometer Tools will analyze and give you a report based on today’s market & user experience requirements. If you’re a marketeer or small business owner this solution is perfect to check what your competitor’s website is doing. What are they doing better than you and how can you compete? Hexometer™ will find the shortcomings and glitches in your website content & architecture and bring it to your attention. In just minutes you will know whether your website meets industry standards and what you can do to improve your ranking. If you are a digital marketeer or just a website owner this tool is for you.
